pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarena kumbhakārena bhikkhū pavāritā honti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.4: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū na mattaṁ jānitvā bahū patte viññāpenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.5: Yesaṁ khuddakā pattā te mahante patte viññāpenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.6: Yesaṁ mahantā pattā te khuddake patte viññāpenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.7: Atha kho so kumbhakāro bhikkhūnaṁ bahū patte karonto na sakkoti aññaṁ vikkāyikaṁ bhaṇḍaṁ kātuṁ,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.10: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā na mattaṁ jānitvā bahū patte viññāpessanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.11: Ayaṁ imesaṁ bahū patte karonto na sakkoti aññaṁ vikkāyikaṁ bhaṇḍaṁ kātuṁ,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.13: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.14: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.15: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhū na mattaṁ jānitvā bahū patte viññāpessantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.16: Atha kho te bhikkhū te anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.17: saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū na mattaṁ jānitvā bahū patte viññāpentīti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.20: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā na mattaṁ jānitvā bahū patte viññāpessanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.22: vigarahitvā dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.1.23: “na, bhikkhave, patto viññāpetabbo. Yo viññāpeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno patto bhinno hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.2.2: Atha kho so bhikkhu—“bhagavatā paṭikkhittaṁ pattaṁ viññāpetun”ti kukkuccāyanto na viññāpeti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.2.5: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā hatthesu piṇḍāya carissanti, seyyathāpi titthiyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.2.6: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.2.7: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.2.8: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.2.9: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, naṭṭhapattassa vā bhinnapattassa vā pattaṁ viññāpetun”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū—“bhagavatā anuññātaṁ naṭṭhapattassa vā bhinnapattassa vā pattaṁ viññāpetun”ti appamattakenapi bhinnena appamattakenapi khaṇḍena vilikhitamattenapi bahū patte viññāpenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.3.2: Atha kho so kumbhakāro bhikkhūnaṁ tatheva bahū patte karonto na sakkoti aññaṁ vikkāyikaṁ bhaṇḍaṁ kātuṁ,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.3.5: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā na mattaṁ jānitvā bahū patte viññāpessanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.3.6: Ayaṁ imesaṁ bahū patte karonto na sakkoti aññaṁ vikkāyikaṁ bhaṇḍaṁ kātuṁ, attanāpi na yāpeti, puttadārāpissa kilamantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.3.7: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.3.8: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.3.9: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū appamattakenapi bhinnena appamattakenapi khaṇḍena vilikhitamattenapi bahū patte viññāpessantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.3.10: Atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.3.11: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, appamattakenapi bhinnena appamattakenapi khaṇḍena vilikhitamattenapi bahū patte viññāpethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.3.14: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, appamattakenapi bhinnena appamattakenapi khaṇḍena vilikhitamattenapi bahū patte viññāpessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.3.16: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.3.17.1: “Yo pana bhikkhu ūnapañcabandhanena pattena aññaṁ navaṁ pattaṁ cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.3.18: Tena bhikkhunā so patto bhikkhuparisāya nissajjitabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:1.3.19: Yo ca tassā bhikkhuparisāya pattapariyanto so tassa bhikkhuno padātabbo— ‘ayaṁ te, bhikkhu, patto yāva bhedanāya dhāretabbo’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.1.6: abandhano vā ekabandhano vā dvibandhano vā tibandhano vā catubandhano vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.1.20: Sace lāmakaṁ pattaṁ adhiṭṭheti— “mahagghaṁ pattaṁ gahessāmī”ti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.1.22: Tena bhikkhunā saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.1.23: “ayaṁ me, bhante, patto ūnapañcabandhanena pattena cetāpito nissaggiyo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.1.28: yo na chandāgatiṁ gaccheyya, na dosāgatiṁ gaccheyya, na mohāgatiṁ gaccheyya, na bhayāgatiṁ gaccheyya, gāhitāgāhitañca jāneyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.1.31: Yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.1.33: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ pattaggāhāpakaṁ sammanneyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.1.37: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno pattaggāhāpakassa sammuti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.1.45: Sace thero gaṇhāti, therassa patto dutiyassa gāhetabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.1.46: Na ca tassa anuddayatāya na gahetabbo. Yo na gaṇheyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.1.49: Yo ca tassā bhikkhuparisāya pattapariyanto, so tassa bhikkhuno padātabbo— “ayaṁ te, bhikkhu, patto yāva bhedanāya dhāretabbo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.1.50: Tena bhikkhunā so patto na adese nikkhipitabbo, na abhogena bhuñjitabbo, na vissajjetabbo— “kathāyaṁ patto nasseyya vā vinasseyya vā bhijjeyya vā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.1.51: Sace adese vā nikkhipati abhogena vā bhuñjati vissajjeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.2.1: Abandhanena pattena abandhanaṁ pattaṁ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.2.2: Abandhanena pattena ekabandhanaṁ pattaṁ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.2.3: Abandhanena pattena dvibandhanaṁ pattaṁ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.2.4: Abandhanena pattena tibandhanaṁ pattaṁ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.2.5: Abandhanena pattena catubandhanaṁ pattaṁ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.2.6: Ekabandhanena pattena abandhanaṁ pattaṁ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.2.7: Ekabandhanena pattena ekabandhanaṁ pattaṁ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.2.8: Ekabandhanena pattena dvibandhanaṁ pattaṁ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.2.9: Ekabandhanena pattena tibandhanaṁ pattaṁ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.2.10: Ekabandhanena pattena catubandhanaṁ pattaṁ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.2.11: Dvibandhanena pattena abandhanaṁ pattaṁ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.2.26: Abandhanena pattena abandhanokāsaṁ pattaṁ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.2.45: Abandhanokāsena pattena abandhanaṁ pattaṁ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.2.50: Catubandhanokāsena pattena abandhanaṁ pattaṁ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
